languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс сплетает пальцы в замок и молчит несколько секунд.{/n} "От рождения Эмелина отличается от других людей. Специалисты Инквизиции усилили ее дар гипермнезии — существуют определенные процедуры. Она... создает отдельные блоки памяти, которые может запирать на код-слова или же перезаписывать новой информацией. Словно сортирует ящики на полках".

{n}Heinrix locks his fingers and says nothing for a few seconds.{/n} "Since birth, Emelina has been different from other people. Specialists from the Inquisition enhanced her natural gift of hypermnesia — there are certain procedures that can be done. She... creates separate blocks of memory, which she can then lock under a code word or even overwrite with new information. She can organise her mind like a normal person arranges boxes on a shelf."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс сплетает пальцы в замок и молчит несколько секунд.{/n} "От рождения Эмелина отличается от других людей. Специалисты Инквизиции усилили ее дар гипермнезии — существуют определенные процедуры. Она... создает отдельные блоки памяти, которые может запирать на код-слова или же перезаписывать новой информацией. Словно сортирует ящики на полках".

She... creates separate blocks of memory, which she can then lock under a code word or even overwrite with new information. She can organise her mind like a normal person arranges boxes on a shelf."

Specialists from the Inquisition enhanced her natural gift of hypermnesia — there are certain procedures that can be done. She... creates separate blocks of memory, which she can then lock under a code word or even overwrite with new information. She can organise her mind like a normal person arranges boxes on a shelf."

languages.text: {n}海因里希将手指绞在一起，沉默了几秒钟。{/n}“艾米莉娜自出生起就与众不同。她拥有着超凡的记忆，而审判庭的专业人员通过特定程序，强化了她的天赋。她……可以创造许多各自独立的记忆区块，设置密码锁定这些区块，也可以用全新的信息将其中的内容覆盖掉。她可以像普通人整理架子上的盒子一样，整理她自己的思维。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix locks his fingers and says nothing for a few seconds.{/n} "Since birth, Emelina has been different from other people. Specialists from the Inquisition enhanced her natural gift of hypermnesia — there are certain procedures that can be done. She... creates separate blocks of memory, which she can then lock under a code word or even overwrite with new information. She can organise her mind like a normal person arranges boxes on a shelf."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希将手指绞在一起，沉默了几秒钟。{/n}“艾米莉娜自出生起就与众不同。她拥有着超凡的记忆，而审判庭的专业人员通过特定程序，强化了她的天赋。她……可以创造许多各自独立的记忆区块，设置密码锁定这些区块，也可以用全新的信息将其中的内容覆盖掉。她可以像普通人整理架子上的盒子一样，整理她自己的思维。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix entrelaza los dedos y guarda silencio durante unos segundos.{/n} «Desde que nació, Emelina ha sido distinta a los demás. Los especialistas de la Inquisición mejoraron su don innato de hipermnesia a través de ciertos procedimientos. Puede... crear distintos bloques de memoria que luego puede sellar con una palabra clave o sobrescribir con nueva información. Puede organizar su mente igual que una persona normal coloca cajas en una estantería».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix locks his fingers and says nothing for a few seconds.{/n} "Since birth, Emelina has been different from other people. Specialists from the Inquisition enhanced her natural gift of hypermnesia — there are certain procedures that can be done. She... creates separate blocks of memory, which she can then lock under a code word or even overwrite with new information. She can organise her mind like a normal person arranges boxes on a shelf."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix entrelaza los dedos y guarda silencio durante unos segundos.{/n} «Desde que nació, Emelina ha sido distinta a los demás. Los especialistas de la Inquisición mejoraron su don innato de hipermnesia a través de ciertos procedimientos. Puede... crear distintos bloques de memoria que luego puede sellar con una palabra clave o sobrescribir con nueva información. Puede organizar su mente igual que una persona normal coloca cajas en una estantería».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは指を組み、数秒間何も言わなかった。{/n}「生まれたときから、エメリナさんは他の人とは違っていました。異端審問庁の専門家は、彼女の記憶過剰という天性の才能を強化しました。実行できる特定の手順があります。彼女は…個別の記憶ブロックを作ってそれを暗号ワードでロックすることができます。新しい情報で上書きすることさえできます。彼女は、普通の人が棚に箱を並べるように、心を整理することができるんです」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix locks his fingers and says nothing for a few seconds.{/n} "Since birth, Emelina has been different from other people. Specialists from the Inquisition enhanced her natural gift of hypermnesia — there are certain procedures that can be done. She... creates separate blocks of memory, which she can then lock under a code word or even overwrite with new information. She can organise her mind like a normal person arranges boxes on a shelf."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは指を組み、数秒間何も言わなかった。{/n}「生まれたときから、エメリナさんは他の人とは違っていました。異端審問庁の専門家は、彼女の記憶過剰という天性の才能を強化しました。実行できる特定の手順があります。彼女は…個別の記憶ブロックを作ってそれを暗号ワードでロックすることができます。新しい情報で上書きすることさえできます。彼女は、普通の人が棚に箱を並べるように、心を整理することができるんです」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix joint les doigts et reste silencieux pendant quelques secondes.{/n} « Depuis sa naissance, Emelina est différente des autres. À l'aide de certaines procédures, des spécialistes de l'Inquisition ont amélioré son don inné d'hypermnésie. Elle... crée des blocs de mémoire séparés qu'elle peut ensuite verrouiller à l'aide d'un mot de passe ou même supplanter avec de nouvelles informations. Elle peut organiser son esprit de la même manière que l'on dispose des boîtes sur une étagère. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix locks his fingers and says nothing for a few seconds.{/n} "Since birth, Emelina has been different from other people. Specialists from the Inquisition enhanced her natural gift of hypermnesia — there are certain procedures that can be done. She... creates separate blocks of memory, which she can then lock under a code word or even overwrite with new information. She can organise her mind like a normal person arranges boxes on a shelf."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix joint les doigts et reste silencieux pendant quelques secondes.{/n} « Depuis sa naissance, Emelina est différente des autres. À l'aide de certaines procédures, des spécialistes de l'Inquisition ont amélioré son don inné d'hypermnésie. Elle... crée des blocs de mémoire séparés qu'elle peut ensuite verrouiller à l'aide d'un mot de passe ou même supplanter avec de nouvelles informations. Elle peut organiser son esprit de la même manière que l'on dispose des boîtes sur une étagère. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix verschränkt seine Finger und sagt einige Sekunden lang nichts.{/n} "Schon seit ihrer Geburt ist Emelina anders als die übrigen Menschen. Spezialisten der Inquisition haben ihre natürlich Gabe der Hypermnesie verstärkt – es gibt da gewisse Prozeduren. Sie ... erzeugt getrennte Gedächtnisblöcke, die sie mit einem Codewort verschließen oder sogar mit neuen Informationen überschreiben kann. Sie kann ihren Geist organisieren wie normale Menschen Kästen in einem Regal."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix locks his fingers and says nothing for a few seconds.{/n} "Since birth, Emelina has been different from other people. Specialists from the Inquisition enhanced her natural gift of hypermnesia — there are certain procedures that can be done. She... creates separate blocks of memory, which she can then lock under a code word or even overwrite with new information. She can organise her mind like a normal person arranges boxes on a shelf."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix verschränkt seine Finger und sagt einige Sekunden lang nichts.{/n} "Schon seit ihrer Geburt ist Emelina anders als die übrigen Menschen. Spezialisten der Inquisition haben ihre natürlich Gabe der Hypermnesie verstärkt – es gibt da gewisse Prozeduren. Sie ... erzeugt getrennte Gedächtnisblöcke, die sie mit einem Codewort verschließen oder sogar mit neuen Informationen überschreiben kann. Sie kann ihren Geist organisieren wie normale Menschen Kästen in einem Regal."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, parmaklarını kenetleyip birkaç saniye boyunca hiçbir şey söylemiyor.{/n} "Emelina doğduğu andan itibaren diğer insanlardan farklıydı. Engizisyon uzmanları, bazı özel prosedürler uygulayarak doğal hipermnezi yeteneğini geliştirdi. Hafızasında... Ayrı bloklar yaratabiliyor, bunları özel bir parolayla kilitleyebiliyor ve hatta onları yeni bilgilerle yeniden yazabiliyor. Normal bir insanın raftaki kutuları düzenlemesi gibi kendi zihnini organize edebiliyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix locks his fingers and says nothing for a few seconds.{/n} "Since birth, Emelina has been different from other people. Specialists from the Inquisition enhanced her natural gift of hypermnesia — there are certain procedures that can be done. She... creates separate blocks of memory, which she can then lock under a code word or even overwrite with new information. She can organise her mind like a normal person arranges boxes on a shelf."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix parmaklarını kenetliyor ve birkaç saniye boyunca hiçbir şey söylemiyor.{/n} "Emelina doğduğu andan itibaren diğer insanlardan farklı olmuştur. Engizisyon uzmanları, bazı özel prosedürler uygulayarak doğal hipermnezi yeteneğini geliştirmiştir. Hafızasında... Ayrı bloklar yaratabiliyor, bunları özel bir parolayla kilitleyebiliyor ve hatta onları yeni bilgilerle yeniden yazabiliyor. Normal bir insanın raftaki kutuları düzenlemesi gibi kendi zihnini organize edebiliyor."
